Market Survey and Procurement 
Title: Repairs and Maintenance - Fort Smith - Upper Air Station

**Job Details:**

The Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is seeking a contractor to provide building maintenance services, grounds maintenance, and minor projects, including emergency repair services. The contractor will provide labour, tools, and equipment to carry out maintenance repairs, minor alterations, and building checks. The work will be performed at the Upper Air Station in Fort Smith, Northwest Territories.

**Scope of Work:**

* Electrical: perform minor electrical works and repairs, including outlets, switches, lights and fixtures, meters, panels, and fire alarms
* Plumbing: perform minor plumbing works and repairs, including fixtures, hot and cold water lines, water heaters, and exterior sewage tanks/septic systems
* HVAC: perform minor HVAC works and repairs, including furnace and air conditioner maintenance, circulation pumps, and boilers
* Carpentry: perform minor carpentry works and repairs, including windows, doors, hardware, and various building components

**Terms and Conditions:**

* The contract period is from the date of contract to March 31, 2025, inclusive
* Canada has the option to extend the contract by up to three (3) additional one-year periods, subject to the same conditions
* The contractor will be paid in accordance with the applicable provisions as set out in the Basis of Payment

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your request for proposal, which includes a detailed plan and budget for the work, to the contact listed below:

* Heidi Noble
* Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca
* (289) 348-2015

**Key Dates:**

* Publication Date: January 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: February 29, 2024, at 5:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)
* Expected Contract Start Date: April 1, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2025

**Trade Agreements:**

This project is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.
